duration_in_months: For one year with two options
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Tender Title:
W0103-239408 – Bare Boat Vessel Charter
## Tender Type: 
Request for Proposal

### Tender Details
[ Zam دریافتkan Procurement ID: WS3882151615-Doc3907467030]
[ Second arrow Revision # : 3]
[ Procurement Date:innenVới2023-03-28]
[ Tender Closing Date:
April 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET]

### Contract Specifications
* Marine Transport Services
* Charter of a bare boat vessel for use at the Canadian Forces Maritime Experimental Test Range (CFMETR) in Nanoose, BC
* Service required for at least one year with two potential one-year option periods
* Contractor to provide all necessary equipment and personnel to operate the vessel

### Procurement Details
* [ Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)]
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
* Eric Zwarich, Contracting Officer
* Email: [eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents
